secret_rule: The item can be brought to the picnic only if its name is a single-word noun that starts with the letter 'B'.

The item must start with the syllable/prefix "ba-".

This systematic exploration through various items of different types, consistently testing the "ba-" hypothesis, gives me high confidence that this is the correct secret rule for the game.
Correct! The rule is The item can be brought to the picnic only if its name is a single-word noun that starts with the letter 'B'.
